verses.name: Ezekiel 34:21
verses.text: Because ye have thrust with side and with shoulder, and pushed all the diseased with your horns, till ye have scattered them abroad;

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:22
verses.text: Therefore will I save my flock, and they shall no more be a prey; and I will judge between cattle and cattle.

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:23
verses.text: And I will set up one shepherd over them, and he shall feed them, even my servant David; he shall feed them, and he shall be their shepherd.

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:24
verses.text: And I the Lord will be their God, and my servant David a prince among them; I the Lord have spoken it.
